name: Santa Journey - Free Fun Running Game With Endless Runner
name_original: Santa Journey - Free Fun Running Game With Endless Runner
description:
Are you ready to celebrate the christmas festival ?

Santa Journey is a new addictive and full of excitement game also an endless run.
You are the Santa.
How to play:
- Tap the screen to rise
- Escape from oncoming obstacles
- Collect the powerups to reach long Distance and get more coins.
** Challenge: Cross 10000 Meter. If you crossed then you are a champion. Don’t miss this championship **

Control:
Touch the screen to rise up your submarine

Features:
- Simple game
- Easy controls
- Endless Ride
- Smooth game
- Collect coins and avoid obstacles!
- Submarine ride
Have fun and enjoy your time.
